summary:
Human rights lawyer with significant international and domestic clerkship experience in analysing, interpreting, developing and applying international human rights law and domestic (criminal and civil) law. 

I know how to work under pressure of deadlines and responsibilities, prioritise work efficiently and thrive in an international working environment which challenges me intellectually.

2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Strasbourg, Alsace, France', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'Council of Europe', 'description': "As a drafting lawyer, I was in charge of processing applications lodged with the European Court of Human Rights against Slovenia and Hungary. I was drafting complex Chamber and Committee judgements and decisions, notes to the President, procedural notes (anonymity, confidentiality, priority requests, etc.), interim measure decisions (Rule 39) and communication reports in cases covering a variety of human rights issues. I prepared hundreds of legal documents presented to the Judges of the Court for deliberations and, as regards the correspondence with the parties, to Section Registrars. The drafts I produced showcase my ability to conduct a comprehensive legal research, analyse State legislation and identify as well as apply European and international human rights standards to the facts of the case. Throughout the years I trained legal professionals on the European Convention on Human Rights and published articles on important Court’s case-law. I was also in charge of reviewing relevant press releases, updating country-specific reports and the Court's manual on broader-WECL procedure, which is used by the Registry's lawyers. Between March 2019 and December 2020 I was in charge of managing the caseload of the whole State Unit.", 'title': 'Assistant Lawyer at the European Court of Human Rights', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Softbase d.o.o.', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Slovenia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'Softbase d.o.o.', 'description': "I was reviewing the company's employment and service contracts and ensuring the company's regulatory compliance.
